newsitem.title: USA: Ross Stores July same-store sales up 14 pct.
newsitem.headline: Ross Stores July same-store sales up 14 pct.

text.p: Ross Stores Inc reported sales of $145 million for the four week period ended August 2, 1997, up 23 percent from $118 million in the year-ago period, and comparable store sales rose 14 percent versus a nine percent increase for the same month last year.
For the 13 weeks ended August 2, sales were $491 million, a 21 percent increase above the $406 million a year earlier.
Comparable store sales for the second quarter rose 12 percent versus a nine percent increase a year earlier.
For the six months ended August 2, 1997, sales rose 20 percent to $934 million from a year ago. Comparable store sales rose 12 percent versus an 11 percent increase a year earlier.
